title: LoL Spam/Virus/Elo Bossing?
body:
So three to 12 times a day I've been getting random adds from level 1 accounts that go grey as soon as you add them and at some points they don't even show in my friends list. Some will auto-send you an Elo boosting website and others will just stick there not doing anything. At first I just deleted them but now I'm getting 3-12 a day and it's REALLLLLLY annoying. Is riot doing anything about this? 

Anyone else getting these rather annoying, spam adds?

replies.body:
I got about three of them in my account life-time, then I stopped accepting friend requests from randoms. It really sucks how you can't do anything about it in the client.

If you have the account names, you can submit a support ticket and explain what exactly is happening. They might be able to do something about it.

Best of luck.
